ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and made his descendants the survivors;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and made his offspring the only ones to survive,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and We made his offspring the only survivors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And, his progeny, them We made the survivors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We made his offspring the survivors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We made his seed the survivors,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And made his seed the survivors,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and We made his offspring the only survivors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And his offspring! them We made the survivors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and made his descendants the survivors,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And made his progeny to endure (on this earth);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And, his progeny, them We made the survivors (i.e. Shem, Ham and Japheth).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and We made his offspring the survivors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We made his descendants the survivors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We made his descendants those remaining [on the earth]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:77] and made his descendants the survivors, thus all human beings are descended from him, peace be upon him. He had three sons: Shem (Sām), the ancestor of the Arabs, the Persians and the Byzantines; Ham (Hām), the ancestor of the Negroes; and Japheth (Yāfith), the ancestor of the Turks, the Khazar and [the peoples of] Gog and Magog and [the inhabitants of] such regions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And made his seed the survivors) until the Day of Judgement. Noah had three sons: Shem, Ham and Yapheth. Shem is the father of the Arabs and those people surrounding them; Ham is the father the Abyssinians, Berbers and inhabitants of Sind; and Yapheth is the father of the rest of people,
